sentence.Network_en: Acidic soil is paradise for nematodes, parasitic roundworms that destroy crops.
sentence.Network_cn: 酸性土壤是线虫和寄生蛔虫的乐土, 而这些害虫会将农作物摧毁.

sentence.Network_en: Once they are back in the intestines, the larvae mature into adult roundworms.
sentence.Network_cn: 幼虫返回肠道后会发育为成熟的蛔虫.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 蛔虫（Roundworms） 寄生于犬猫之小肠，吸取营养，引起消化障碍，神经症状，及其他疾病，特别对幼犬感染率高，可经由胎盘感 …

list.abs: disease英语的解释,disease... ... rope disease 马铃薯粘腐病; roundworm disease 线虫病; 蛔虫病; runt disease 【免疫】侏儒病.
disease... ... rope disease 马铃薯粘腐病 roundworm disease 线虫病 runt disease 【免疫】侏儒病.
raccoon roundworms are not excreted by their human host ., 浣熊蛔虫不会被人类宿主排泄.
other researchers had shown that reducing the activity of the pathway in roundworms and fruitflies extends lifespan .其他研究已经表明，在蛔虫和果蝇体内减小该通路活性可以延长寿命。
杀 suppress杀蛔虫 kill roundworm杀虫 kill worms

entry.def: A roundworm is a very small worm that lives in the intestines of people, pigs, and other animals.

auth_sentence.content: Experiments had showed that starvation made roundworms live longer.
auth_sentence.res_content: Experiments had showed that starvation made roundworms live longer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Experiments had showed that starvation made roundworms live longer.
